title: Find Two Non-overlapping Sub-arrays Each With Target Sum
content:
Given an array of integers  and an integer .
You have to find two non-overlapping sub-arrays of  each with sum equal . There can be multiple answers so you have to find an answer where the sum of the lengths of the two sub-arrays is minimum.
Return the minimum sum of the lengths of the two required sub-arrays, or return -1 if you cannot find such two sub-arrays.
